f3dd05a8-1a47-42f8-b0ad-bd3cd6ca296d | lsc = | icon = }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}. ==Background== This estate is the base of operations for the [[Bardatto Family]] of the [[Vailian Trading Company]], responsible for operating the primary Company bank. ==Points of interest== * The ground floor contains the great hall with plenty of Bardatto guards, the study in the northwestern corner, and two bedrooms in the southwestern corner. The western bedroom contains a hidden panel with minor loot. * The vault cannot be explored, as the guard will politely kick you out the moment you approach the bars. You can ransack it during [[Family Pride]] if you take the Valera route. Alternatively if you have high enough stealth you can slip past the guards. * [[Ezzali's Ledger]] can be found in the Records Room and is used to assist in achieving peace between the families during [[Family Pride]]. A window in the same room can be used to escape if you chose to side with the Valera's in said quest. ==Characters== * [[Ezzali Bardatto]], the matriarch. * [[Nera Bardatto]], her daughter. * [[Larro Bardatto]], her son, only if he safely survived [[Salt in the Wound]]. * [[Captain Vilami]], guard in the vault. ;During the heist in [[Family Pride]] * [[Belda]], leader of the gang of Valera-hired thugs. * [[Persa]], a Valera associate tasked with some of the logistics behind the heist. ==Loot== * [[Bardatto's Luxury]]: Received or looted from [[Ezzali Bardatto]]. * [[Deltro's Cage]]: Looted from [[Ezzali Bardatto]]. * [[Deltro's Cage Helm]]: Looted or pickpocketed from [[Ezzali Bardatto]]. * [[RÃ¤nnig's Wrath]] and [[Resounding Call]]: In the vault. ==Gallery== PE2_Bardatto_Estate_Exterior.png | Building exterior PE2_Bardatto_Crest.png | Bardatto family crest above the entrance
